import sys

def main():
    out = 0
    in_ = 0
    # Read lines from stdin
    lines = [line.strip() for line in sys.stdin]

    # Parse input
    n, shuffle = lines[0].split()
    n = int(n)

    # Solve problem
    if shuffle == 'out':
        out = n // 2
        if n % 2 == 1:
            out += 1
    else:
        in_ = n // 2
        if n % 2 == 0:
            in_ += 1

    # Print results
    print(out)
    print(in_)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
